title: Kaikan Shokunin
sinopse: The story is about a woman OL who goes to the club "TOKYO" after her boyfriend dumps her because she is always expressionless, like beautiful statue. In this club there are very gorgous men who provide therapy to women in order to be more beautiful and to relax, especially Naoki who has Angel's hands. With his hand he will make women fell better... but there is a problem: he is a maniac of beautiful hands so he'll fall in love with them! (Source: Shoujo Manga Maniac)
